member.name: T:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1
member.summary:
Aggregating queue with a set of worker threads.
Contain two queues:
1) processing queue - contain packages for processing by a set of worker-threads.
2) preparation queue - to create the next packages for processing queue. Added items are pushed to the preparation queue.By timer event (or using ForcePushAllPreparedPackages). Items from preparation queue are aggregated to packages and pushed to the processing queue. Worker-threads process packages from processing queue using given Action.

member.name: P:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1.MaxPackageSize
member.summary: Max size of the package that can be added to the queue

member.name: P:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1.TimerPeriodMs
member.summary: Time in ms for package sending timer

member.name: P:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1.State
member.summary: Current state

member.name: P:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1.CurrentQueueSize
member.summary: Count of packages in the processing queue

member.name: P:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1.TotalProcessedItemsCount
member.summary: Total count of items, that was processed

member.name: P:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1.TotalProcessingQueuePushCount
member.summary: Total count of items, that was added to the processing queue

member.name: P:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1.TotalAddedItemsCount
member.summary: Total count of items, that was added by any Add or Push method

member.param: Holder for action that the worker-threads will perform with packages from the processing queue

member.exception: Instance state is not correct for this action

member.summary: Add collection of items to the preparation queue
member.exception: Instance state is not correct for this action

member.name: M:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1.PushPackage(System.Collections.Generic.List{`0})
member.summary: Push the package to the processing queue. WARNING - this method push package direct to the processing queue. So all items from preparation queue(after timer event) will be after that package in the processing queue, not before!
member.exception: Instance state is not correct for this action

member.name: M:Qoollo.ClickHouse.Net.AggregatingQueueProcessor.ClickHouseAggregatingQueueProcessor`1.ForcePushAllPreparedPackages
member.summary: Creates packages using all items from preparation queue and pushes them to the processing queue.
member.exception: Instance state is not correct for this action
